title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 51 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 51 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Have mercy upon me, O God, according to thy lovingkindness: according unto the multitude of thy tender mercies blot out my transgressions.
lineList.cn: （大卫与拔示巴同室以候，先知拿单来见他。他作这诗，交与伶长）神阿，求你按你的慈爱怜恤我，按你丰盛的慈悲涂抹我的过犯。

lineList.en: Wash me throughly from mine iniquity, and cleanse me from my sin.
lineList.cn: 求你将我的罪孽洗除净尽并洁除我的罪。

lineList.en: For I acknowledge my transgressions: and my sin is ever before me.
lineList.cn: 因为我知道我的过犯我的罪常在我面前

lineList.en: Against thee, thee only, have I sinned, and done this evil in thy sight: that thou mightest be justified when thou speakest, and be clear when thou judgest.
lineList.cn: 我向你犯罪，惟独得罪了你，在你眼前行了这恶，以致你责备我的时候，显为公义。判断我的时候，显为清正。

lineList.en: Behold, I was shapen in iniquity; and in sin did my mother conceive me.
lineList.cn: 我是在罪孽里生的。在我母胎的时候，就有了罪。

lineList.en: Behold, thou desirest truth in the inward parts: and in the hidden part thou shalt make me to know wisdom.
lineList.cn: 你所洗爱的，是内里诚实。你在我隐密处，必使我得智慧。

lineList.en: Purge me with hyssop, and I shall be clean: wash me, and I shall be whiter than snow.
lineList.cn: 求你用牛膝草洁净我，我就乾净，求你洗涤我，我就比雪更白。

lineList.en: Make me to hear joy and gladness; that the bones which thou hast broken may rejoice.
lineList.cn: 求你使我得听欢喜快乐的声音，使你所压伤的骨头，可以踊跃。

lineList.en: Hide thy face from my sins, and blot out all mine iniquities.
lineList.cn: 求你掩面不看我的罪，涂抹我一切的罪孽。

lineList.en: Create in me a clean heart, O God; and renew a right spirit within me.
lineList.cn: 神阿，求你为我造清洁的心，使我里面重新有正直的灵。（正直或作坚定）。

lineList.en: Cast me not away from thy presence; and take not thy holy spirit from me.
lineList.cn: 不要丢弃我，使我离开你的面。不要从我收回你的圣灵。

lineList.en: Restore unto me the joy of thy salvation; and uphold me with thy free spirit.
lineList.cn: 求你使我仍得救恩之乐，赐我乐意的灵扶持我。

lineList.en: Then will I teach transgressors thy ways; and sinners shall be converted unto thee.
lineList.cn: 我就把你的道指教有过犯的人。罪人必归顺你。

lineList.en: Deliver me from bloodguiltiness, O God, thou God of my salvation: and my tongue shall sing aloud of thy righteousness.
lineList.cn: 神阿，你是拯救我的神。求你救我脱离流人血的罪。我的舌头就高声歌唱你的公义。

lineList.en: O Lord, open thou my lips; and my mouth shall shew forth thy praise.
lineList.cn: 主阿，求你使我的嘴唇张开，我的口便传扬赞美你的话。

lineList.en: For thou desirest not sacrifice; else would I give it: thou delightest not in burnt offering.
lineList.cn: 你本不喜爱祭物。若喜爱，我就献上。燔祭你也不喜悦。

lineList.en: The sacrifices of God are a broken spirit: a broken and a contrite heart, O God, thou wilt not despise.
lineList.cn: 神所要的祭，就是忧伤的灵。神阿，忧伤痛悔的心，你必不轻看。

lineList.en: Do good in thy good pleasure unto Zion: build thou the walls of Jerusalem.
lineList.cn: 求你随你的美意善待锡安，建造耶路撒冷的城墙。

lineList.en: Then shalt thou be pleased with the sacrifices of righteousness, with burnt offering and whole burnt offering: then shall they offer bullocks upon thine altar.
lineList.cn: 那时，你必喜爱公义的祭，和燔祭并全牲的燔祭。那时，人必将公牛献在你坛上。
